item.title: Centralized Storage
item.description: Before we get into centralized storage, we should touch on the classic storage DAS. DAS (Direct Attached Storage), is the traditional storage type; as the name itself implies it refers to storage which is dedicated to the use of the computer of server, like this disk integrated in your laptop or PC.
